note.p: Birth: Mancetter, Warwickshire, England
Baptism: (26 September 1641)
Death: 25 March 1712
Burial: The Dodson family vault, Cheshunt parish church, Hertfordshire
Research Field: Plant morphology, plant anatomy; Chemistry
Education: Pembroke College, Cambridge; BA (1649/50); Leyden; probably MD (c1671)

Career: Practised in Coventry (1671) and then in London; Editor of 'Philosophical Transactions' (1678-1679); compiled a catalogue of the Royal Society's repository; died suddenly while going on his rounds
Memberships: Hon FRCP (1680)
Membership: Fellow
Election Date: 2/11/1671
Proposers: Robert Hooke
Council: Sec 1677-1679; Council 1675, 1677-83, 1690, 1692; Plant Anatomy Curator 1672-1673
Editor Phil. Trans.:1677-1679
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; DSB; Venn; Hunter; Innes Smith
